changes.rscadd: New Wretch subclass, the Antiquarian - A gadgeteer thief from Heartfelt that relies on cantrips and is probably going to super-hell. Don't ask about the flies. 5 spells to go with the aforementioned Antiquarian, and a new mask to go with the Antiquarian.

changes.sound: Added the song SALON (BETA) by T87-Suflurhead, added new sounds to go along with the new spells.
